name: Don't Stand Out
detailed_description:
Don't Stand Out - multiplayer skill-based shooter with voxel graphics and elements of “Battle royale” genre. Quick matches of four up to eight players, less preparation, more action!

Play strategically: set traps, control an area, hide, run. Or do the exact opposite, bring chaos to the battlefield, burn and freeze everything, destroy everything you can get your hands on!

The king is not a king without his crown! Become the best player of the week and get your well-deserved reward
about_the_game:
Don't Stand Out - multiplayer skill-based shooter with voxel graphics and elements of “Battle royale” genre. Quick matches of four up to eight players, less preparation, more action!

Play strategically: set traps, control an area, hide, run. Or do the exact opposite, bring chaos to the battlefield, burn and freeze everything, destroy everything you can get your hands on!

The king is not a king without his crown! Become the best player of the week and get your well-deserved reward
short_description: Multiplayer shooter, in which a backflip is a solution to all your problems. Destroy, burn and freeze your enemies to win in the battle royale or fail while trying to do so!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 / AMD Radeon 290 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit processor and operating system
